name: Spin It Bright
description:
Fast paced, bullet hellish game with shapes. Survive as long as you can.

Your goal is to keep green square spinning bright. Avoid red shapes, hit orange, dash to move quickly between targets (you're invincible while dashing).

Controls (controller support tested on PS4 gamepad):

  • Move - arrow keys /  WASD / analog stick
  • Dash - Space / X / A

This is prototype, inspired by Just Shapes & Beats, I started about two years ago and abandoned it. Recently, encouraged by one of Thomas Brush's video, I decided to finish playable version and publish it. Let me know what you think about it

Music: Retro Game Music Pack by Juhani Junkala.
SFX made with BFXR.

If you like this game you can subscribe to my mailing list and get notified about my future projects: https://www.getrevue.co/profile/morten-studio

P.S. If there are at least three comments about leaderboards, I will add them. Promise.
